Package org.sontana.tools

Class CursorPosition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sontana.components.Position
      • org.sontana.tools.CursorPosition
  • public class CursorPosition
extends Position
    CursorPosition allows for ease-of-computation for cursor position between the screen and the game world.
    Author:
    Christophe Simon
